text: ryy anak del ban changaoulobangheanh puok anak nowknong pheap ngngut teang nowleukok ning leu phtaisamoutr brasaer cheang? haey anaknea del banhchoun khyal chea damnoengola muoy mounnung kdei me tda krounea robsa trong(tuk phlieng) mokadl? tae mean mcheasa phe sa ng del trauv korp sakkar ruom chea muoy a l laoh ryy? a l laoh mha khpangkhpasa cheang avei del puokke thveu shi ri k
